SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, B.JIBUN_SN, A.*, B.SIDO_NM||' '||B.SIGUNGU_NM||' '||B.EMD_NM||' '||TRIM(B.LNM_NO)||CASE B.LNM_SUB WHEN '0' THEN '' ELSE '-'||B.LNM_SUB || CASE B.MT_YN WHEN '0' THEN '' ELSE '(ì‚°)' END END AS JIBUN_NM FROM ( SELECT JUSO_MNG_NO ,ROAD_CODE ,EMD_NO ,R.SIDO_NM ||' '||R.SIGUNGU_NM||' '||R.EMD_NM||' '||R.ROAD_NM||' '||J.MAIN_NO||CASE SUB_NO WHEN 0 THEN '' ELSE '-'||SUB_NO END AS ROAD_NM FROM GAM_ROAD_INFO R INNER JOIN GAM_JUSO_INFO J USING (ROAD_CODE, EMD_NO) WHERE EMD_NM IS NOT NULL AND R.ROAD_NM LIKE '%'||#sRoadNm#||'%'
TO_CHAR(J.MAIN_NO) LIKE '%'||#sMainNo#||'%'
TO_CHAR(J.SUB_NO) LIKE '%'||#sSubNo#||'%'
) A INNER JOIN GAM_JIBUN_INFO B ON (A.JUSO_MNG_NO = B.JUSO_MNG_NO)
